segments.text: Hi , Ben . Here are the top ten of this week's top chart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which is your favorite in this ten ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . In fact , I think it's much better than this week's No . 1 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think about Cold Wind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like it as well , but I don't think it's as good as Sweet Heart .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So No . 4 is your favorite . Which one don't you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I don't like Your Lips very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's too slow makes me sleepy . In fact , it's the worst in this week â€™ s top ten , if you ask me .
